coreAttributes.name: feather duster
coreAttributes.description: #IF(pc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_SHOPPING_ARCADE_ASHLEYS_SHOP)) A short-handled feather duster, ideal for keeping a house clean, but not much use in combat. [ashley.speech(A feather duster: the epitome of romance, at least for those who don't know anything about their lover, other than that they're the person who keeps the house clean.)] #ELSE A short-handled feather duster, ideal for keeping a house clean, but not much use in combat... #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swipe)] [npc.her] feather duster at [npc2.name] and [npc.verb(manage)] to tickle [npc2.her] [npc2.face].
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] feather duster at [npc2.name], grinning as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tickle)] [npc2.her] torso.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swipe)] [npc.her] feather duster at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
